LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.label: High-speed dehydration
LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.description: An extremely violent, but not fatal, dehydration reaction that turns the organism into a mass of organic matter that can be rehydrated and restored to its original form.
LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.stages.0.label: Mild
LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.stages.1.label: Moderate
LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.stages.2.label: Severe
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.label: Dehydration recovery
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.description: Weakness due to excessive dehydration can be recovered quickly, but it takes a long time to get rid of it completely..
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.stages.0.label: Chronic
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.stages.1.label: Recover
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.stages.2.label: Severe
